db:partintro.db:para: The purpose of the content process is to produce good rhetoric. The content management process is, therefore, the rhetoric management process. Content stratety is rhetoric strategy.
But is rhetoric something we can actually model or manage or constrain. For a great deal of content, the answer is yes.
But can structures and constraints really produce good rhetoric? Again, the answer is yes.
But will writer accpet working this way. With the right system design, which treats rhetorical models are tools of the writer rather than as shackles, the answer is yes.
